product_description: With a chain, kiltie and crystals on the heel, this square-toe slingback pump shows you can stride from the boardroom to girl's night in serious style.
product_details_and_care:
With a chain, kiltie and crystals on the heel, this square-toe slingback pump shows you can stride from the boardroom to girl's night in serious style.
2" heel (size 8.5)
